full_summary:
### Reissuance - Media Monitoring Services {EN578-191713}

* **Reference Number:** [WS4001099544-Doc4001272839](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16471311?extsite=MTY0NzEzMTFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
* **Publication Date:** June 2, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: December 31, 2028 (14:00:00 ET)
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
* **End User Entities:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
* **Notice Type:** Request for Supply Arrangement (RFA)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Variations or combinations of the methods mentioned above
* **Trade Agreements:** This tender adheres to the [Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)](https://cfta-aceg.gc.ca/index_e.html)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: None
* **Regions of Delivery:** Canada
* **Tender Description:** 
This event is to reissue on CanadaBuys the Request for Supply Arrangements in the link below:
 
 [Media Monitoring Services - Tender Notice | CanadaBuys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities/tender-notice/pw-cy-037-80201)
 
 All relevant amendments apply.

### Contact Information:

* **Name:** Obeng-Asante, Leticia (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email:** [leticia.obeng-asante@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:leticia.obeng-asante@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Phone:** Not provided

Please note that the rewritten text has been formatted in markdown and is limited to 400 words. The original information has been preserved, with any clarifications or simplifications made for the sake of professional presentation.  The main goal is to convey information concisely, making it easier to understand for potential bidders.
